name: GHSnooze
description: An easier way to deal with your notifications on GitHub.

scripts.test: npm run-script style && NODE_ENV=test npm run-script unit-tests
scripts.build-macos: npm run build-css && if [ -d dist/GHSnooze-darwin-x64 ]; then rm -r dist/GHSnooze-darwin-x64; fi && electron-packager . --version=1.4.3 --out=dist --app-version=$npm_package_version --prune --asar --overwrite --platform=darwin --arch=all --ignore=test
scripts.build-linux: npm run build-css && if [ -d dist/GHSnooze-linux-ia32 ]; then rm -r dist/GHSnooze-linux-ia32; fi && if [ -d dist/GHSnooze-linux-x64 ]; then rm -r dist/GHSnooze-linux-x64; fi && electron-packager . --version=1.4.3 --out=dist --app-version=$npm_package_version --prune --asar --overwrite --platform=linux --arch=all --ignore=test
scripts.build-windows-wine: npm run build-css && if [ -d dist/GHSnooze-win32-ia32 ]; then rm -r dist/GHSnooze-win32-ia32; fi && if [ -d dist/GHSnooze-win32-x64 ]; then rm -r dist/GHSnooze-win32-x64; fi && electron-packager . --version=1.4.3 --out=dist --app-version=$npm_package_version --prune --asar --overwrite --platform=win32 --arch=all --ignore=test

author: probablycorey, cheshire137, summasmiff
